short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notifications for specific deals! Just fill in interesting keywords   e.g. thailand ) and that's it!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension allows you to receive notifications regarding relevant deals that can be found on Fly 4 Free website. 

It is pretty simple to use:
Install the plugin, navigate to the options page, setup a few keywords (  e.g. relevant destination names ) and that's it!
Whenever a new deal is posted that matches any of your keywords, you'll receive a notification.
